A Civic Technologist's Practice Guide 📚

Oct 21, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • govtech

Civic Design Consultant and author Cyd Harrel joins us for a conversation about their new book A Civic Technologist’s Practice Guide, which seeks to be a grounding document in the space.
